description: Mio continues her nightly assignations, but now she`s servicing both camps in order to make enough to realize her dream of owning her very own rice paddy. She just wants to get a little bit back from the war that`s taken everything, but playing both sides against the middle is a high-stakes maneuver. Hyakkimaru also works harder, but his condition makes it exceedingly dangerous to hunt the antlion demon. What can he gain, and what is lost?

titles.title: L`histoire de la chanson de Moriko, deuxième partie
The Story of the Moriko Song, Part 2
